name: Perish Song
effect: At the end of each round, Roll Damage Dice equal to a Quarter of the foe's total max HP (rounded down, up to 5 Dice). Inflicts Wounds. Lasts 4 Rounds. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. -2 Accuracy. Sound Based.
description: A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your death bed.
